items.title: Viktor Frankl's Logotherapy
items.headline: The Discovery of Meaning
objectives_summary: Viktor Frankl's life and theory of Logotherapy. You will learn about the life of Viktor Frankl and his meaning-centered philosophy which he coined, Logotherapy. The founders of the Viktor Frankl Institute of America, Pam Roy and Alex Vesely (Frankl's grandson) will walk you through the history of Logotherapy and present exercises to help you find out what matters most to you so you can live a purposeful life. The course contains video footage of Frankl speaking about topics such as self-transcendence, unconditional meaning, and the existential vacuum. This course relates Frankl's philosophy to modern times.

items.title: The Secrets Behind Winning at The Lottery Game

items.headline: It takes more than luck to win at the lottery game. The videos will help you discover the hidden secrets.
objectives_summary: •	You will learn that the numbers are not random they have a pattern and sequence they follow in each draw •	 How the sequence works, and when it starts and when it ends •	How to analyze and understand the order in which the numbers come and the numbers they like to travel with.  •	How to analyze the numbers in any lottery system-- IN ANY COUNTRY that uses a number system to determine the winner •	This is a proven method of increasing your odds at winning the lottery. You will be learning from the people who developed and used this method to win.  •	Learn to change your beliefs about winning and being successful •	Gain a winners attitude and understand that it is your beliefs that hold you back from success

items.title: How to Create a Powerful & Effective Vision Board
items.headline: Manifest your goals, dreams & intentions and create your reality.
objectives_summary: You will learn everything you need to know about Vision Boards; definition, background, history, and why they work.
You will learn a step-by-step formula to create a powerful, creative and effective Vision Board that will help you manifest your goals, dreams and intentions and make them a reality.
You will gain clarity and focus on who you want to be and what you want to attract into your life.
